client.title: Share to Save
description: Want to save on your Justia Marketing Solutions? Refer a friend. Our brand new Justia Marketing Solutions Referral Program allows both you and your referred colleagues to save on eligible purchases from Justia! You’ll get a $100 Justia Credit for each successful referral, while your colleagues will receive $50!
Contact us below for more details, or learn more by reviewing the program terms.

jld.title: Take Advantage of a New Pro-Only Benefit
description: Justia Connect Pros now have the opportunity to receive California MCLE credit for select Justia Webinars! Two have already been held this year and future MCLE presentations will be announced via the Justia Webinar Center. By upgrading to Justia Connect Pro now, you’ll have one less step to complete for CLE credit eligibility when the next presentation is announced.
